example.parse: (PP (PUNC -LRB-) (PREP ك) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON من)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يبغي) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC جمع) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الماء))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN خزان)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN دون) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN قعر)))))))))) (PUNC -RRB-))))))))))

arg.g: collect water in a bottomless container
